name: Fashion Brawl
description:
Claws out! It’s time to battle — girl style! Welcome to Fashion Brawl, the only fighting game that takes place exclusively in a fashion boutique.

Step up to the podium. It’s time to take on your opponent. Get those claws out and fight! Whoever is left standing will take the fashion crown. So tell us — are you ready to play Fashion Brawl?
